history.narrative: Law 2-11, the “Residential Parking Tax Exemption Act,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-62, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 22, 1977 and April 5, 1977, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 25, 1977, it was assigned Act No. 2-32 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
